name: ZexaXeza Warrior Princess of the Cosmos
name_original: ZexaXeza Warrior Princess of the Cosmos
description: ZexaXeza was a proud princess from a technologically advanced kingdom. Her father Xezrual was a proud and kind ruler, but his brother Xi was obsessed with immortality and was banished when he tried taking over the kindgom. Xi and his men were hid in the cosmos for many years and he achieved immortality but at the cost of a zombified body and cybernetic enhancements and he controlled minds of his followers. They came back secretly kidnapping the King so Xi can take over his mind so he could surrender the kingdom to him. Zexa Xeza travel from planet to planet tracking them down. Investigating and fighting to find and save her Father.
